msg: o Making top level pom 1.0: it can be bumped with minor numbers for
each release out of these trunks.  So for example if we change it
for ApacheDS 1.0-RC1 then we can bump it up to 1.0.1 or something.
o Added licenses and notices for inclusion in jar files in distributions.
I appologize in advance for this madness of having copies all over.
I could not find a way to include the top level files using a general
resource section in the pom.  If anyone finds a better way let's delete
